translations: 领步人；慢行者；溜蹄的马（pacer 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The Lakers have also expressed an interest in the Pacers 'earl Watson.
sentences.translation: 湖人队也表示他们对步行者队的厄尔·沃特森有兴趣。

sentences.sentence: Don't be so harsh on the rockets... the pacers did give Dallas a tough game last night after all.
sentences.translation: 不要对火箭队太严苛…毕竟昨晚步行者队让小牛队打了一场硬战。

sentences.sentence: Atlanta also owns Indiana's pick at No. 11, as part of the trade that sent al Harrington to the Pacers last summer.
sentences.translation: 亚特兰大，也赢得印第安纳的11顺位，这是作为去年夏天将哈灵顿卖给步行者的交易之一。
